title: Business & Finance
text:
Take-Two agreed to buy Zynga in a roughly $11 billion deal as the maker of Grand Theft Auto looks to expand its mobile portfolio with hits such as Words With Friends and FarmVille.

---

The Fed's Clarida said he would resign on Friday, two weeks before his term is set to end. His resignation follows questions raised over financial transactions he conducted at the onset of the pandemic.

Powell is expected to win a second term as Fed chairman, but must first face a grilling Tuesday at his Senate confirmation hearing.

---

Microsoft 's augmented-reality team has lost around 100 people in the past year, many of them to Meta Platforms , as the battle heats up for workers with skills to build the metaverse.

---

The S&P 500 and Dow fell 0.1% and 0.4%, respectively, but an afternoon rebound erased losses in tech stocks, helping the Nasdaq to a 0.05% gain.

---

Intel removed references to China's Xinjiang region from an open letter it sent suppliers last month, after the contents of the note sparked a social-media uproar in China.

---

Cerberus is selling a chunk of its stakes in Deutsche Bank and Commerzbank , following years of disappointing share performances at the lenders.
